name: part_008
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】#まちゅまちゅ動画 ～インターネット老人会～【ホロライブ⧸夏色まつり】 [CXLL4W4w4I8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Natsuiro Matsuri concludes her performance of 'Migi Kata no Chou'.
MC section where Matsuri discusses the previous song, shows off her butterfly-themed headset, and introduces the next song.
Natsuiro Matsuri performs 'Roku-chou-nen to Ichi-ya Monogatari'.

subtitles.original: ♪右肩の蝶 (レンver.)
subtitles.english: ♪Butterfly on My Right Shoulder (Len ver.)

subtitles.original: …感情を知る
subtitles.english: ...knowing the emotions.

subtitles.original: 不協和音
subtitles.english: Dissonance.

subtitles.original: はい、ということで、またもや超懐かしい曲を歌ってしまいました。
subtitles.english: Hi, so, I've sung another very nostalgic song.

subtitles.original: 「ワールドイズマイン」から「右肩の蝶」でございまして…
subtitles.english: From "World is Mine" to "Butterfly on My Right Shoulder"...

subtitles.original: 見てよこれ！ 超可愛くない？
subtitles.english: Look at this! Isn't it super cute?

subtitles.original: 蝶だけに？ 超可愛くない？ これ！
subtitles.english: Just like a butterfly? Isn't it super cute? This!

subtitles.original: 見て見て見て！ 今回のためにね、作っていただきましたよ。
subtitles.english: Look, look, look! It was made specifically for this occasion.

subtitles.original: やっぱりね、「右肩の蝶」と言えばね、この…なんて言うんですかこれ？
subtitles.english: After all, when you think of "Butterfly on My Right Shoulder", you think of this...

subtitles.original: なんかこの、蝶柄、蝶の形したヘッドフォンみたいなのがね。
subtitles.english: What do you call it? This butterfly-shaped headphone-like thing.

subtitles.original: いや、こだわりでございますな。古を感じてとても良き、懐かしい気持ちになった。
subtitles.english: It's a point of detail. Feeling the "ancient" vibes, I felt very nostalgic.

subtitles.original: しかもなんかまつり、この曲を今回初めてフルで歌ったんですけども、
subtitles.english: And, for the first time, I sang the full version of this song.

subtitles.original: いや、かっこいいし、なんかちょっと大人な気持ちになれましたね。
subtitles.english: It was cool and I felt a bit mature.

subtitles.original: どうかな？ これ船長か？ どう？
subtitles.english: How was it? Was it Senchou-like? How?

subtitles.original: ま、まつりの中の大人のイメージ、船長とか、ノエルたんとか、そんな感じなのでね。
subtitles.english: Well, my image of "mature" is like Senchou or Noel-tan.

subtitles.original: まあ合ってるでしょう、これも。(笑) ということで、あ、見せてくれた。
subtitles.english: Does it fit? (Laughs) So, anyway, ah, they showed it to me.

subtitles.original: ちょっと下手なんだよね。ということでね、次の曲に行っちゃおうかな？
subtitles.english: I'm a bit bad at it. So, let's move on to the next song!

subtitles.original: もうね、ここからは後半戦でございます、ますよ。
subtitles.english: From here on, it's the second half!

subtitles.original: それでは続いての曲行きましょー！
subtitles.english: Let's go to the next song!

subtitles.original: 続いての曲は、六兆…もう一回！
subtitles.english: The next song is... Six Trillion... one more time!

subtitles.original: 続いての曲は、六兆年と一夜物語！
subtitles.english: The next song is, "Six Trillion Years and Overnight Story"!

subtitles.original: ♪六兆年と一夜物語
subtitles.english: ♪Six Trillion Years and Overnight Story

subtitles.original: 名も無い時代の集落の
subtitles.english: In a village of a nameless era,

subtitles.original: 名も無い幼い少年の
subtitles.english: a nameless young boy's

subtitles.original: 誰も知らない おとぎばなし
subtitles.english: fairy tale that no one knows.

subtitles.original: 産まれついた時から
subtitles.english: From the moment he was born

subtitles.original: 忌み子 鬼の子として
subtitles.english: as a cursed child, a child of a demon,

subtitles.original: その身に余る 罰を受けた
subtitles.english: he received a punishment beyond his means.

subtitles.original: 悲しい事は 何も無いけど
subtitles.english: There is nothing sad, but

subtitles.original: 夕焼け小焼け 手を引かれてさ
subtitles.english: in the evening glow, having his hand pulled.

subtitles.original: 知らない 知らない 僕は何も知らない
subtitles.english: I don't know, I don't know, I don't know anything.

subtitles.original: 叱られた後のやさしさも
subtitles.english: Not even the kindness after being scolded,

subtitles.original: 雨上がりの手の温もりも
subtitles.english: or the warmth of a hand after the rain.

subtitles.original: でも本当は 本当は 本当は 本当は 寒いんだ
subtitles.english: But truly, truly, truly, truly, it's cold.

subtitles.original: 死なない 死なない 僕は何で死なない?
subtitles.english: I won't die, I won't die, why won't I die?

subtitles.original: 夢のひとつも見れないくせに
subtitles.english: Even though I can't even see a single dream.

subtitles.original: 誰も知らない おとぎばなしは
subtitles.english: The fairy tale that no one knows

subtitles.original: 夕焼けの中に吸い込まれて消えてった
subtitles.english: was sucked into the sunset and disappeared.

subtitles.original: 吐き出すような暴力と
subtitles.english: With violence like spitting out,

subtitles.original: 蔑んだ目の毎日に
subtitles.english: and days with eyes of contempt,

subtitles.original: 君はいつしか そこに立ってた
subtitles.english: before I knew it, you were standing there.

subtitles.original: 話しかけちゃだめなのに
subtitles.english: Even though I shouldn't talk to you,

subtitles.original: 「君の名前が知りたいな」
subtitles.english: "I want to know your name."

subtitles.original: ごめんね 名前も 舌も無いんだ
subtitles.english: I'm sorry, I have neither a name nor a tongue.

subtitles.original: 僕の居場所は どこにも無いのに
subtitles.english: Even though there's no place for me anywhere,

subtitles.original: 「一緒に帰ろう」 手を引かれてさ
subtitles.english: "Let's go home together," you said, pulling my hand.

subtitles.original: 知らない 知らない 僕は何も知らない
subtitles.english: I don't know, I don't know, I don't know anything.

subtitles.original: 君はもう子供じゃないことも
subtitles.english: Not even that you're no longer a child,

subtitles.original: 慣れない他人の手の温もりは
subtitles.english: or that the unfamiliar warmth of someone else's hand

subtitles.original: ただ本当に 本当に 本当に 本当のことなんだ
subtitles.english: is just truly, truly, truly, truly real.

subtitles.original: やめない やめない 君は何でやめない?
subtitles.english: You won't stop, you won't stop, why won't you stop?

subtitles.original: 見つかれば殺されちゃうくせに
subtitles.english: Even though you'll be killed if you're found.

subtitles.original: 雨上がりに 忌み子がふたり
subtitles.english: After the rain, two cursed children,

subtitles.original: 夕焼けの中に吸い込まれて消えてった
subtitles.english: were sucked into the sunset and disappeared.

subtitles.original: 日が暮れて夜が明けて
subtitles.english: The sun set and the night broke,

subtitles.original: 遊び疲れて捕まって
subtitles.english: tired of playing and caught,

subtitles.original: こんな世界 僕と君以外
subtitles.english: in a world like this, everyone else but you and me

subtitles.original: みんな居なくなればいいのに
subtitles.english: should just disappear.

subtitles.original: みんな居なくなればいいのに
subtitles.english: Everyone should just disappear.

subtitles.original: 知らない 知らない 声が聞こえてさ
subtitles.english: I don't know, I don't know, a voice was heard,

subtitles.original: 僕と君以外の全人類
subtitles.english: and all of humanity except you and me

subtitles.original: 抗う間もなく 手を引かれてさ
subtitles.english: without a moment to resist, had their hands pulled.

subtitles.original: 夕焼けの中に吸い込まれて消えてった
subtitles.english: and were sucked into the sunset and disappeared.

subtitles.original: 知らない 知らない 僕は何も知らない
subtitles.english: I don't know, I don't know, I don't know anything.

subtitles.original: これからのことも 君の名も
subtitles.english: Not about what's to come, or even your name.

subtitles.original: 今は 今は これでいいんだと
subtitles.english: "For now, for now, this is fine,"

subtitles.original: ただ本当に 本当に 本当に...
subtitles.english: just truly, truly, truly...
